abilities.menu_description: Rampage gains (+0.1/0.115/0.13/0.145/0.16/0.175/0.19/0.205/0.22/0.235/0.25/0.265/0.28/0.295/0.31/0.325/0.34/0.355% ) bonus health regeneration. This regeneration is doubled while in the Jungle. Upon being immobilised, Rampage gains 60% Tenacity for 4s and restores (+3% ) of his maximum health over the same duration.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 54 (+60%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Swing your Infernal Cane.
• Fire {BaseProjectileCount} piercing waves over {Duration}s. • Each deals {Damage}()Damage. • Fire an additional wave within the same duration per {Essence} Essence.
abilities.menu_description: Swing your weapon to fire 3 piercing projectile waves over 1.5s that each deal 50/60/70/80/90 (+18%) damage. Swings faster to create an additional projectile within the same duration per 50 Essence.

abilities.game_description:
Launch a Demonic Spawn.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage over {Duration}s. • Pulls Targets towards its epicenter. • Executes Targets below {ExecuteBaseThreshold}% (+{EssenceIncreaseExecute}% per {EssenceBreakpointExecute} Essence) Health. • Heals you for {Healing}% of Damage you deal to affected Targets. • Healing is {MinionHealing}% effective against Minions and Monsters. • Radius is increased by {EssenceIncreaseSize}% per {EssenceBreakpointSize} Essence.
abilities.menu_description: Launch a Soul Orb that deploys upon contact with a Hero or the World. Once deployed, the Soul Orb attacks nearby Enemy Targets, pulling them in and dealing 90/130/170/210/250 (+60%) magical damage over 4s. Enemies that take damage from Soul Orb while below 8% (+1% per 25 Essence) health are executed. Renna is healed for 16/18/20/22/24% of her damage dealt to Targets attached to the Soul Orb. Healing is 8% effective against Minions and Monsters. The radius is increased by 1% per 10 Essence.

abilities.game_description:
Shift up and conjure an Orb of Deception.
• Fly upwards and Hover for {ReactivateTime}s. • Upon reactivation or after the duration, fire the Orb. • The Orb deals {Damage}()Damage. • Mesmerizes Targets for {Mesmerize}s. • Deals an extra {BonusDamage}% Current Health Damage per {Essence} Essence.
abilities.menu_description: Renna shifts upwards and prepares to launch a ball of demonic energy. Upon re-activating or after 1.5s, Renna will launch the orb that explodes on contact dealing 80/100/120/140/160 (+50%) damage and mesmerizing Targets hit for 1.05/1.1/1.15/1.2/1.25s. Deals an additional 1% of the Target's Current Health as Magical Damage per 15 Essence.

abilities.game_description:
Choose a location to unleash the Abyss.
• Channel for {TimeBetweenShots}s before Blinking to target location. • Summon an infernal singularity for {Duration}s. • Fires a projectile at each nearby Enemy every {TimeBetweenShots}s. • Each projectile deals {Damage}()Damage. • Damage is increased by {DamageIncrease}% against Targets below {HealthThreshold}% Health. • Lasts {EssenceTimeExtension}s longer per {Essence} Essence.
abilities.menu_description: After a brief channel, Renna teleports to the Target location and summons an infernal singularity above herself for 5s that unleashes projectiles every 0.5s at nearby Targets that deal 42/58/74 (+15%) magical damage, increased by 50% against Targets below 30% health. Lasts 0.5s longer per 50 Essence.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Nearby Enemy Deaths sometimes drop Essence.</Header>
• Heroes always leave behind <EffectText>Essence</EffectText>. 
• <EffectText>Essence</EffectText> can be consumed by moving nearby.
• <EffectText>Essence</EffectText> improves your abilities.

• Using Jump while mid-air will cause
 you to glide slowly downwards.
abilities.menu_description:
Entities that die near Renna have a chance of leaving behind their Essence that can be consumed by moving nearby. Heroes always leave behind Essence. Essence enhances Renna's abilities directly.

If Renna Jumps while mid-air, she will begin to hover, falling slowly.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}. The Fourth Shot has the following properties: • It will always Critically Strike. • Deals bonus Damage based on the Target's Missing Health.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 53 (+95%) physical damage. The final round will always critically strike. After four basic attacks, Revenant will automatically reload.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Reload your Hand Cannon.</Header>
• Automatically <EffectText>Reloads</EffectText> after <EffectText>4</EffectText> Basic Attacks.

<EffectText>Passive:</EffectText>
• <AttackDamageText>Critical Damage</AttackDamageText> is adjusted to <AttackDamageText>{CriticalDamageBonus}%</AttackDamageText>. 
• Fourth Shot deals <HealthText>{MissingHealthDamage}% Missing Health</HealthText> <AttackDamageText>Damage</AttackDamageText>.
• Fourth Shot hits grant you <EffectText>{MovementSpeed}% Movement Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Passive: Critical Damage is modified to 160/<wbr>162/<wbr>164/<wbr>166/<wbr>168/<wbr>170%.

Hand Cannon's final round deals bonus physical damage equal to 4/<wbr>5/<wbr>6/<wbr>7/<wbr>8/<wbr>9% (+0.5% per Level) of the Target's missing health and grants Revenant 33% movement speed for 2s.

Active: Revenant reloads his Hand Cannon.

abilities.game_description:
Unleash {Missiles} missiles that seek random Targets.
• Each deals {Damage}()Damage. • Heroes take {ConsecutiveMissilesModifier}% Damage from consecutive missiles. • Prioritises Marked Targets.
abilities.menu_description: Unleash 10 ethereal missiles within a wide cone that home towards random Enemies. If a Target is Marked by Scar, the missiles prioritize them instead. Each missile deals 45/60/75/90/105 (+40/48/56/64/72%) (+70%) physical damage. Enemy Heroes take 9% damage from missiles beyond the first.

abilities.game_description:
Launch a cursed orb.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Applies {Instances} stacks of Marked for {Duration}s. • Hitting a Marked Hero deals {Damage}()Damage and consumes a stack. • Upon consuming all stacks, the Target is Rooted for {Root}s.
abilities.menu_description: Launch a cursed orb that deals 15/20/25/30/35 (+15%) (+20%) physical damage and apply 4 stacks of Marked for 6s. Dealing damage to a Marked Target deals 15/20/25/30/35 (+15%) (+20%) physical damage and consumes a stack. Upon consuming all stacks, the Target is Rooted for 1/1.05/1.1/1.15/1.2s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Throw plane shifting plasma at an Enemy Hero.</Header>
• <CC_Text>Slows</CC_Text> by <CC_Text>{Slow}%</CC_Text> for <CC_Text>{SlowDuration}s</CC_Text>.
• Force them into the <EffectText>Nether Realm</EffectText> with you for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• Heroes in the <EffectText>Nether Realm</EffectText> are <CC_Text>Banished</CC_Text>.
• Killing the Hero doubles the <GoldText>Gold</GoldText> from <AbilityName>Bounty Hunter</AbilityName>.
abilities.menu_description:
Revenant pulls himself and his Target into the Nether Realm for 6/<wbr>7/<wbr>8s and Slows them by 80% for 0.7s. 

Killing his opponent inside the Nether Realm will double the bonus gold gained from Bounty Hunter.

abilities.game_description:
• Gain <AttackDamageText>Physical Power</AttackDamageText> based on <AttackDamageText>Crit Chance</AttackDamageText> and <AttackDamageText>Attack Speed</AttackDamageText>.
• Currently gaining: <AttackDamageText>{PhysicalPower} Physical Power</AttackDamageText>.

<Header>On killing an Enemy Hero:</Header>
• Gain <GoldText>{AdditionalGold}</GoldText> (+<GoldText>{AdditionalBountyGold}</GoldText> per Bounty Stack) additional <GoldText>Gold</GoldText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Revenant's Physical Power is increased by 3/<wbr>3/<wbr>3/<wbr>3/<wbr>3/<wbr>5/<wbr>5/<wbr>5/<wbr>5/<wbr>5/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>9% (+1% per 10% Critical Strike Chance)(+2% per 10% Bonus Attack Speed).

Killing an Enemy Hero grants 25 (+25 per bounty stack) additional gold.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 61 (+100%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Throw your chain forward.
• Attaches to the first Enemy hit. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Damage increased by {HealthPercent}% Target Maximum Health. • Pull Heroes to your location.
abilities.menu_description: Launch Riktor's chain forward, attaching to the first Enemy hit, dealing 25/65/105/145/185 (+100%) (+9% of the Target's maximum health) magical damage and Pulling them towards him.

abilities.game_description:
Swing an electrified whip.
• Destroys Enemy Shields. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Silences for {SilenceDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Swing an electrified whip that destroys enemy shields before dealing 90/120/150/180/210 (+60%) magical damage and Silencing them for 1s.

abilities.game_description:
Emit an electrical aura.
• Grants {MovemenSpeedBuff}% Movement Speed for {Duration}s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage over {Duration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Emit an electrical aura, granting Riktor 10/14/18/22/26% movement speed and dealing 130/170/210/250/290 (+12% ) (+70%) magical damage to all nearby Enemies over 5s.

abilities.game_description:
Unleash a torrent of chains.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Suppresses for {StunDuration}s. • After the Suppression deal {Damage}()Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Unleash a torrent of chains from Riktor, dealing 120/210/300 (+55%) magical damage to all Enemies in front of him and Suppressing them for 1.25s. After the Supression expires Riktor rips the chains out, repeating the damage.

abilities.game_description:
Damaging enemies with Riplash or Skewer:
• Grants a {Shield}()Shield for {Duration}s. • Does not apply against Minions.
abilities.menu_description:
Riktor shields himself for 5/<wbr>5/<wbr>5/<wbr>5/<wbr>5/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>11/<wbr>11/<wbr>11% of his maximum health when damaging Heroes & Monsters with Riplash or Skewer.

The shield lasts 3.5s and may stack.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 65 (+95%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Clap your wings in front of you.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Resets your Basic Attack Cooldown.
abilities.menu_description: Serath claps her wings in front of her dealing 90/125/160/195/230 (+80/85/90/95/100%) physical damage and applying a 35% Slow for 2s. Chastise cast speed increases with additional attack speed and resets Serath's basic attack cooldown on use.

abilities.game_description:
Disappear and dash to your Target.
• Become CC Immune and Invulnerable. • Strike Enemies at your Target's location {NumberOfSlashes} times. • Strikes deal {Damage}()Damage. • Deals {ExtraAttackDamageReduction}% Damage for subsequent hits. • Strikes apply On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness. • Monsters receive {MonsterDamage} additional Damage per strike. • Reappear at the Target's location.

Each strike deals 40/65/90/115/140 (+45%) physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 75% effectiveness. Additional strikes against the same Target deal 35% damage. On her final strike, Serath will teleport to the marked Target's location based on her current position. If the marked Target dies, Serath teleports immediately.

abilities.game_description:
Rise up and target an area to attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Triggers automatically after {HoverTime}s.
abilities.menu_description: Serath rises up into the air and hovers for up to 1.8s. During this time, she can target an area up to 1350 units away. Upon confirmation, she dives down and deals 95/130/165/200/235 (+100%) physical damage. Serath automatically dives to the ground after 1.8s

abilities.game_description:
Take demonic form to gain immense power for {Duration}s.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage around you. • Gain {Movespeed}% Movement Speed. • Gain {Attackspeed}% Attack Speed. Grants Infernal Strikes: • Deal {BurnDamage}()Damage On-Hit over {BurnDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Serath takes demonic form, dealing 80/140/200 (+50%) physical damage to nearby Enemies and setting them ablaze. For the next 7s, she gains 12% movement speed, 20/40/60% attack speed, and empowers her basic attack with Infernal Strikes. Infernal Strikes sets Enemy Units ablaze on-hit, dealing 30/50/70 (+25%) true damage on-hit over 4s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>On Hero Takedown:</Header>
• The Hero drops a demonic visage for <EffectText>10s</EffectText>.
• Upon touching it, activate <AbilityName>Heresy</AbilityName> at no cost. 
• Reduces current <EffectText>Basic Ability Cooldowns</EffectText> by <EffectText>{CooldownReduction}%</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Takedowns on Enemy Heroes leave behind a demonic visage for 10s.

Upon touching it, Serath activates Heresy at no cost and reduces her current basic ability cooldowns by 65%.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 60 (+80%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Glide forward, draining all Enemies.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Dash forward, dealing 30/55/80/105/130 (+4%) magical damage to all Enemies Sevarog passes through and Slowing them by 75% for 0.5s.

abilities.game_description:
Strike forward with a spectral hand.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Each Soul grants {DamagePerStack} additional Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Strike forward with a spectral hand, dealing 90/105/120/135/150 (+2.5% )(+45%) magical damage to all Enemies in front of Sevarog.

abilities.game_description:
Call down a miasma of dark energy.
• Deal {Damage}()Damage. • Roots for {RootDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Call down a miasma of dark energy, dealing 100/135/170/205/240 (+50%) magical damage to all Enemies in the area and Rooting them for 1.5s.

abilities.game_description:
Deliver a heavy blow from your hammer.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Heroes are Knocked Back. Enhanced: • {UltCD}% reduced Cooldown. • Executes Minions.
abilities.menu_description: Deliver a heavy blow from Sevarog's hammer, dealing 220/320/420 (+75%) magical damage to all Enemies in front of him. Enemy Heroes struck by the blow are Knocked Back, sending them flying. Enhanced: Colossal Blow's Cooldown is reduced by 40% and it now Executes Minions.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>On killing Enemies with Abilities:</Header>
• Gain a <EffectText>Soul</EffectText> that grants <HealthText>{HealthPerStack}</HealthText> <HealthText>Health</HealthText>.
• <EffectText>{StacksT1}/{StacksT2}/{StacksT3}/{StacksT4} Souls</EffectText> grant <HealthText>{HealthT1}/{HealthT2}/{HealthT3}/{HealthT4} Health</HealthText>.
• <EffectText>{StacksT1} Souls</EffectText>: <EffectText>{Omnivamp}% Omnivamp</EffectText>.
• <EffectText>{StacksT2} Souls</EffectText>: <AbilityPowerText>{Shred}% Magical Armor Shred</AbilityPowerText> <EffectText>Hero Aura</EffectText>.
• <EffectText>{StacksT3} Souls</EffectText>: <EffectText>Enhance</EffectText> <AbilityName>Colossal Blow</AbilityName>.
• <EffectText>{StacksT4} Souls</EffectText>: <EffectText>Aura</EffectText> affects all Targets and deals 
   <HealthText>(+{PercentHealth}% Target's Max Health)</HealthText> <AbilityPowerText>Damage</AbilityPowerText> every <EffectText>1s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Sevarog gains Souls when he Kills an Enemy with an ability. Each Soul grants 1 bonus health and 0.5 additional Siphon damage. 

Sevarog reaches an additional Tier of power at 40/80/120/160 Souls, gaining 40/60/80/100 bonus health and new effects:
• Tier 1: +8% Omnivamp.
• Tier 2: Gain an Aura that Shreds nearby Enemy Heroes' Magical Armor by 15%.
• Tier 3: Colossal Blow becomes Enhanced.
• Tier 4: The Aura now Shreds all Targets and deals (+1% Target's Max Health) magical damage every 1s.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 49 (+80%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Dash forward.
• Pass through all Units. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Charges: 2.
abilities.menu_description: Dash forward a fixed distance dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+40%) magical damage to all enemies Shinbi passes through. Max Charges: 2.

abilities.game_description:
Summon a Spirit Wolf that runs in a straight line.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Passes through all Units.
abilities.menu_description: Summon a Spirit Wolf that runs in a straight line and passes through all Enemy Targets dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+50%) magical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Summon 4 Spirit Wolves that circle you.
• Grants a {Shield}()Shield. • Lasts {Duration}s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage over {Duration}s. • Grants another {Shield}()Shield. • Damaging an Enemy Hero reduces the Cooldown of Rushing Beat by {CDReduction}% per hit.
abilities.menu_description: Summon 4 Spirit Wolves that circle Shinbi for 3s, granting a 50/70/90/110/130 (+30%) shield for the same duration and after the wolves expire. The wolves deal 20/31/42/53/64 (+30%) magical damage over the duration to nearby enemies and reducing the cooldown of Rushing Beat by 12% per hit against enemy heroes.

abilities.game_description:
Summon a pack of Spirit Wolves above Targets.
• Targets all Heroes with Track Stacks. • Deals {Damage}()Damage per Spirit Wolf. Passive: Ability hits on Heroes applies Track for {StackDuration}s. • Stacks up to {MaxStacks} times per Target.
abilities.menu_description: Passive: Dealing damage to Enemy Heroes with Abilities applies Track for 8s, stacking up to 8 times per target. Active: Summon a pack of Spirit Wolves to attack all Targets with Track Stacks, dealing 50/80/110 (+15%) magical damage per Spirit Wolf.

abilities.game_description:
• Deal an additional {Damage}()Damage On-Hit.
On dealing damage with a Basic Attack:
• Deals {Multiplier}x Damage and applies Track. • Ability hits on Heroes reduces the Cooldown by {CDReduction}s.
abilities.menu_description: Basic attacks deal an additional 12 (+10%) magical damage on-hit. Periodically Biting Melody deals 3x damage. Damaging an Enemy Hero with an ability decreases the cooldown by 1s.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 57 (+75%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Hypercharge Starfire.
• Lasts {Duration}s and Refreshes on Takedown. • Deals {Damage}()Damage per hit. • Applies On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness. • Heroes take {DamageRamp}% more Damage per hit. Max: 25%. • Deal (+{Pen}% Enemy Physical Armor) Damage at Max Stacks. Passive: Basic Attacks deal {PassiveDamage}()Damage on-hit.
abilities.menu_description: Skylar hypercharges Starfire for 5s (refreshes on hero takedown): Convert bonus attack speed into on-hit physical damage and attack at a fixed rate of 10 attacks per second. Damage is modified to 1/3/5/7/9 (+11%)(+4%)(+12%) per instance and applies on-hit effects at 11% effectiveness. Dealing Damage to the same target within 1s increases the damage by 1.25%, stacking up to 25 times. At maximum stacks, deal damage equal to 6/9/12/15/18% of the targets Bonus Physical Armor. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 4/8/12/16/20 (+10% ) bonus physical damage on-hit.

abilities.game_description:
Launch a bouncing nano bubble:
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attaches to the first Target hit for {Delay}s. After the duration: • Deals {ExplosionDamage}()Damage to nearby Enemies. • Slows them by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Launch a bouncing nano bubble that attaches to the first target hit for 0.75s and deals 20/35/50/65/80 (+20% ) physical damage. After the duration, the target and nearby enemies take 70/100/130/160/190 (+125%)(+65%) physical damage and are Slowed by 40/50/60/70/80% for 1s.

abilities.game_description:
Thrust upwards after a short delay.
• Hover for {HoverDuration}s. Whilst Hovering, dealing damage will fire a missile: • Deals {Damage}()Damage to the same Target. • Can only occur intermittently with Hypercharge.
abilities.menu_description: After a short delay, thrust upwards in your current movement direction and hover for 3.75s. During this time, dealing damage will fire a missile that deals 15/20/25/30/35 (+20%)(+15%) physical damage to the same target. This can only occur intermittently with Hypercharge but the time decreases with bonus attack speed.

abilities.game_description:
Unleash the Atomiser.
• Travels until colliding with Terrain or an Enemy Hero. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Deals an extra {MissingHealthDamage}% Missing Health Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Channel for a short period of time before firing a large orb of unstable energy. The orb stops on the first hero hit, exploding, dealing 200/330/460 (+150%)(+90%)(+15/20/25% of target’s missing health) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Upon killing an Enemy Unit:
• Form an orb that explodes after 0.75s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Orbs from Heroes have triple Damage and Radius. • Gain additional Jump Height.
abilities.menu_description:
Skylar gains additional Jump Height.

Killing an Enemy Unit makes it explode after 0.75s, dealing 30 (+5 per level) physical damage to nearby targets.

Explosions from Enemy Heroes are 3x larger and deal 3x more damage.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 59 (+85%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Charge a powerful piercing arrow.
• Reaches maximum power after {MaxChargeTime}s. • Deals up to {Damage}()Damage. • Damage increases by {IncreasedPercent}% per Relentless stack. • Deals {SecondaryPercent}% Damage to Targets beyond the first. • Pierces through all Units and Terrain.
abilities.menu_description: Charge a Terrain piercing arrow, reaching 50-100% maximum power after 1s and dealing up to 100/145/190/235/280 (+140/145/150/155/160%) physical damage to all Enemies in its path. Targets afflicted by Relentless receive 9% additional damage per stack and Targets beyond the first take 60% damage.

abilities.game_description:
Release a volley of arrows raining down over 2.5s.
• Deal {Damage}()Damage over 8 hits. • Slows by {SlowPercent}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Release a volley of arrows that rain down over 2.5s, dealing 100/135/170/205/240 (+100%) physical damage to all Enemies in the area over 8 hits. Enemies struck by Hail Of Arrows are Slowed by 40% for 0.8s.

abilities.game_description:
Focus your mind, becoming empowered.
• Gain {Percent}% Attack Speed for {Duration}s. • Every 2nd Basic Attack against a Target deals {Damage}()Bonus Damage. • This Bonus Damage applies a stack of Relentless.
abilities.menu_description: Sparrow focuses her mind, gaining 30/35/40/45/50% attack speed for 6s. Every second subsequent basics attack against the same target while Heightened Senses is active deals (+25%) bonus physical damage and applies an additional stack of Relentless.

abilities.game_description:
Unleash a barrage of arrows.
• Fires {MaxShots} volleys over {Duration}s. • Center arrows deal {Damage}()Damage. • Side arrows deal {SideDamage}()Damage. • Arrows Pierce through Units. • Arrows apply On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% efficiency. • Arrows can Critically Strike.
abilities.menu_description: Unleash a barrage of fanned arrows, firing 12/14/16 volleys over 3.5s. The center arrow deals (+70%). Side arrows deal (+58%) damage instead. Inner Fire's arrows pierce Enemy Units, can Critically Strike and apply On-Hit effects at 30% effectiveness.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>On successful Ability hits and Basic Attacks:</Header>
• Apply a stack of <EffectText>Relentless</EffectText> to Targets for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• For each stack, deal <HealthText>{HealthPercent}% Target's Maximum Health</HealthText> as <AttackDamageText>Damage</AttackDamageText> <EffectText>On-Hit</EffectText>.
• Max Stacks per Target: <EffectText>{NumStacks}</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Sparrow's Basic Attacks and Abilities apply stacks of Relentless to Enemy Units. 

Her Basic Attacks against Targets afflicted by Relentless deal an additional 0.4% of their maximum health as bonus physical damage On-Hit, per stack.

Relentless stacks last for 3s, stacking up to 6 times.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 65 (+90%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Bash forward with your shield.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Deals an extra {HealthPercent}% Maximum Health Damage. • Stuns for {StunDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Swipe forward with Steel's shield, dealing 45/70/95/120/145 (+50%) (+4/4.5/5/5.5/6% of the Target's maximum health) magical damage to all Enemies in front of him and Stunning them for 0.5s.

abilities.game_description:
Charge forward in a line.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns for 2s and Knocks Back Heroes.
abilities.menu_description: Charge forward, dealing 110/150/190/230/270 (+80%) magical damage to all Enemies in Steel's path. Enemy Heroes struck by Bull Rush are Knocked Back. Monsters and Minions are Stunned for 2s.

abilities.game_description:
Deploy a disruptive wall of energy.
• Destroys Enemy projectiles for {Duration}s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage to Heroes. • Slows by {SlowPercent}% for {SlowDuration}s.

abilities.game_description:
Leap into a powerful impact.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Knocks Up and Stuns for {StunDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Leap into the sky, crashing down at the target location to deal 200/340/480 (+90%) magical damage to all Enemies in the area, Knocking them Up and Stunning them for 1.25s.

abilities.game_description:
On not taking damage for {ShieldRefreshTime}s:
• Gain a {ShieldScaling}()Shield. • The Shield lasts until destroyed. Hybrid Defence: • Gain {PhysicalArmor} Physical Armor (Scales with Bonus Magical Armor). • Gain {MagicalArmor} Magical Armor (Scales with Bonus Physical Armor).
abilities.menu_description:
Steel passively shields himself for 7% of his maximum health.

The shield lasts until destroyed and refreshes if Steel has not taken damage in the last 10/<wbr>10/<wbr>10/<wbr>10/<wbr>10/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>9/<wbr>8/<wbr>8/<wbr>8/<wbr>8/<wbr>8/<wbr>7/<wbr>7/<wbr>7s.

Additionally Steel gains (+15% bonus magical armor) physical armor and (+15% bonus physical armor) magical armor.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 65 (+85%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Charge up and Dash forward:
• Channel to increase Range and Damage over {MaxCharge}s. • Deals {Damage}-{MaxDamage}()Damage based on charge time. • Knocks Back and Stuns for {Stun}s on impact. • Colliding with a Hero stops the Dash. • Times out and refunds {CooldownRefund}% Cooldown after {MaxDuration}s. Empowered: Shields for {Shield}() for {ShieldDuration}s on Enemy Hit.
abilities.menu_description: Terra Channels for up to 4s before dashing. She deals 40/65/90/115/140 (+90%) physical damage to all Enemies in her path, stopping if she collides with a Hero. Enemies hit are Knocked Back for 0.25s. For the first 1.25s, dash range and damage increases, dealing up to 80/130/180/230/280 (+180%). Empowered: On Enemy hit, gain a 5/65/125/185/245 (+13% ) shield for 3.5s.

abilities.game_description:
Spin your axe around you, striking twice
: • Deals {Damage}()Damage each strike. • Hitting Heroes refunds {CooldownRefund}% Cooldown per strike. Empowered: Strike three times: • The third strike deals {TrueDamage}()Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Terra spins her axe, striking all Enemies around her before slashing forward a second time. Each strike deals 40/70/100/130/160 (+90%) physical damage. Enemy Hero hits refund 10% of the cooldown per strike. Empowered: Terra strikes three times, with the third strike dealing 50/75/100/125/150 (+135%) true damage to all Enemies in front of her.

abilities.game_description:
Throw a spectral axe:
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows Enemies by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Pierces Enemy Units. Empowered: Roots Enemies instead for {RootDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Throw a spectral axe, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+100%) magical damage to all Enemies in its path and Slowing by 40% for 1s. Empowered: Roots Enemies instead for 1s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Slam down your helmet</Header>:
• <EffectText>Cleanse</EffectText> any <CC_Text>Debuffs</CC_Text> and gain Max <EffectText>Hersir</EffectText> stacks.

Buff yourself for the next <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>:
• Become <CC_Text>Unstoppable</CC_Text>.

<EffectText>Passive:</EffectText> Gain <AttackDamageText>{PhysicalArmor} Physical Armor</AttackDamageText> and <AbilityPowerText>{MagicalArmor} Magical Armor</AbilityPowerText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Terra’s helmet slams down, Cleansing all Debuffs and granting her maximum Hersir stacks instantly. 

For the next 6/<wbr>7.5/<wbr>9s, Terra becomes Unstoppable (Immune to Crowd Control).

Passive: Gain 8/<wbr>12/<wbr>16 Physical Armor and 8/<wbr>12/<wbr>16 Magical Armor.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Damage Enemies to gain Stacks of Hersir</Header>:
• <EffectText>Skullsplitter</EffectText> grants 1 stack on-hit.
• <EffectText>Ruthless Assault</EffectText> can grant 1 stack per strike.
• <EffectText>Highland Hurl</EffectText> & <EffectText>Wild Rush</EffectText> can grant 1 stack per cast.
• Enter the <EffectText>Base</EffectText> to gain 5 stacks.

Upon reaching 5 Stacks:
• Your next <EffectText>Basic Ability</EffectText> becomes <AbilityName>Empowered</AbilityName>.
abilities.menu_description:
Terra gains stacks of Hersir when damaging Enemies with her Basic Attacks and Abilities, up to a maximum of 5.

At maximum stacks, Terra's next Basic Ability is Empowered with additional effects.

Entering the Base grants Terra maximum Hersir stacks instantly.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 57 (+60%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Create a patch of toxic spores.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage over 2s. • Then, explodes dealing {Damage}()Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Hurl a small plant that deals 140/190/240/290/340 (+100%) magical damage over time to all Enemies in the area, exploding after 2s. Untamed Growth deals 50% of its damage over its lifetime, and 50% upon exploding.

abilities.game_description:
Summon a patch of thorny brambles.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Enemies touched are Slowed by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Grants Allies {MSBuff}% Movement Speed for {SlowDuration}s. • Persists for {Duration}s before wilting.
abilities.menu_description: Summon a patch of thorny brambles, dealing 100/135/170/205/240 (+50%) magical damage to all Enemies that touch them and Slowing them by 45% for 0.75s. Allies within the brambles gain 15% movement speed for 0.75s. Bramble Patch persists for 5s before wilting.

abilities.game_description:
Throw an orb of energy.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Hit the same Target within {StackDuration}s for a bonus. • Deals {StackDamageIncrease}% more Damage. (Stacks up to 4 times.) • Refunds 40% Mana on hitting a Hero or Killing a Unit.
abilities.menu_description: Throw an orb of energy, dealing 80/115/150/185/220 (+50%) magical damage. Hitting the same Target within 8s deals 20% increased damage, stacking up to 4 times. Harvest Nettles refunds 75% of its mana cost upon hitting an Enemy Hero or Killing a Unit.

abilities.game_description:
Awaken a giant fly trap.
• Attaches itself to nearby Heroes. • After a delay it Pulls attached Heroes inward. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns for {StunDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Plant a magical seedling, awakening a giant fly trap that attaches itself to all nearby Enemy Heroes. After a brief delay, it Pulls its victims inward, dealing 250/375/500 (+75%) magical damage and Stunning them for 1s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>On Takedown:</Header>
• Spawn an <AbilityName>Untamed Growth</AbilityName> from the Hero's corpse.
• Gain <EffectText>{SpeedPercent}% Movement Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{RegenerateDuration}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description: Each time The Fey achieves a Takedown she spawns an Untamed Growth from the Enemy Hero's corpse and gains 30% movement speed for 3s.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Fires twice. • Each deals {Damage}()Damage. • Applies On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack that fires two projectiles, each dealing 30 (+47.5%) physical damage and applying on-hit effects at 50% effectiveness.

abilities.game_description:
Launch a bouncing grenade.
• Explodes on contact with an Enemy. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Holds up to 2 grenades.
abilities.menu_description: Launch a grenade in target direction that explodes upon contact with an Enemy Target, dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+55%) magical damage in a small area and Slowing by 20% for 1s. Max Charges: 2.

abilities.game_description:
Fire two piercing projectiles.
• Each deals {Damage}()Damage. • Applies On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness.
abilities.menu_description: TwinBlast charges and fires two superheated piercing projectiles in the target direction, each dealing 55/75/95/115/135 (+40%)(+60%) physical damage and applying on-hit effects to all Enemy Units hit at 65% effectiveness.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Use your thrusters to boost in a direction.</Header>
• Damaging a Hero reduces the <EffectText>Cooldown</EffectText> by <EffectText>{CooldownReduction}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Passive: When TwinBlast deals damage to an Enemy Hero with a Basic Attack or Ability, Rocket Dash's cooldown is decreased by 0.5s.

Active: TwinBlast dashes.

abilities.game_description:
Transform your pistols into machine guns.
• Unleashes a barrage of {NumBullets}()bullets over 3s. • Deals a total of {Damage}()Damage. • Can Critically Strike at {Crit}% effectiveness.
abilities.menu_description: Transform your guns into fully automatic machine guns, unleashing a barrage of 30 (+10% Total Attack Speed) bullets over 3s dealing 12/18/24 (+9%)(+9%) physical damage per bullet. Can Critically Strike at 75% effectiveness.

abilities.game_description:
<Header> On casting an Ability:</Header>
• Increases <EffectText>Attack Speed</EffectText> by <EffectText>{AttackSpeed}%</EffectText>.
• Lasts for <EffectText>{Attacks}</EffectText> Basic Attacks or <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>
abilities.menu_description: Casting an ability will cause TwinBlast's next 2 basic attacks within 4s to benefit from 45% increased Total Attack Speed.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}() Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 55 (+80%) (+15%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Fire a long-range sniper shot:
• Deals {Damage}() Damage. • Deals {BonusDamage}% Bonus Damage to Minions. • Pierces through Terrain and Lifesteals. If this Kills, or Damages a Marked Unit: • Refund {ManaRefund}% Mana Cost and set the Cooldown to {CDROnKill}s.
abilities.menu_description: Fire a long-range sniper shot that pierces Terrain and deals 70/110/130/160/190 (+110%)(+60%) physical damage to the first Enemy Unit hit. Damage is increased by 70% against Enemy Minions. Knock, Knock! benefits from lifesteal. If Knock, Knock! Kills, or Damages a marked Unit, 50% of the Mana Cost is refunded and its Cooldown is decreased to 1s.

abilities.game_description:
Launch a piercing Nanite Grenade.
• Deals {Damage}() Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Units hit are Marked for {MarkDuration}s, Revealing them. Knock, Knock! is enhanced against Marked Units: • Deals an extra {BonusDamage}()% Maximum Health Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Launch a piercing Nanite Grenade that deals 40/50/60/70/80 (+20%)(+40%) physical damage to all Units hit, Slowing them by 27/29/31/33/35% for 1.25s. Units hit are also Marked for 3.5s, Revealing them. Knock, Knock! is enhanced against Marked Units, dealing an extra 4/4.5/5/5.5/6% (+2% per 100 Magical Power) of their maximum health as bonus magical damage and causes the shot to split dealing 50% damage to other Marked Units.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>After a short delay:</Header>
• Enter <EffectText>Camouflage</EffectText>.
• Gain <EffectText>{MoveSpeed}% Movement Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>. 
• Gain <EffectText>1 Enhanced Jump</EffectText>.
• <EffectText>Cooldown</EffectText> resets on <EffectText>Takedown</EffectText>.

<EffectText>Passive: </EffectText>Gain <PenDamageText>{PhysicalPenetrationPercent}% Physical Penetration</PenDamageText>.
abilities.menu_description:
After a short delay, enter Camouflage and gain 25% movement speed and one enhanced Jump for 3s.

Takedowns will reset the cooldown of Surprise, Surprise!

Passive: Gain 10/<wbr>14/<wbr>18/<wbr>22/<wbr>26% Physical Penetration

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Teleport a Hero to a previous location:</Header> 
• Heroes can be selected up to <EffectText>{Range}</EffectText> units away.
• Marks their location from <EffectText>2.5s</EffectText> prior. 
• After <EffectText>1.5s</EffectText> they enter <EffectText>Limbo</EffectText> and <EffectText>Teleport</EffectText> back.
• After <EffectText>Teleporting</EffectText>, they are <EffectText>Marked</EffectText> for <EffectText>{MarkDuration}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description: Wraith can choose an Enemy Hero he can see up to 1550/<wbr>1650/<wbr>1750 units, marking their location from 2s prior. After a 1.5s delay they will enter Limbo and Teleport back to this location.

abilities.game_description:
<Header> Wraith is granted a Sonar Drone that:</Header>
• Replaces your <EffectText>Vision Item</EffectText>.
• Cannot be swapped.

When Sonar Drone is deployed it:
• Becomes <EffectText>Camouflaged</EffectText>.
• Pulses every <EffectText>{PingInterval}s</EffectText>, <EffectText>Revealing</EffectText> nearby Heroes for <EffectText>3s</EffectText>.
• At <AbilityName>Level 6</AbilityName>, <EffectText>Reveals</EffectText> Invisible Units for <EffectText>{StealthDetectionAmount}</EffectText> pulses.
abilities.menu_description:
Wraith's Vision Item becomes a Sonar Drone that will become Camouflaged upon deployment and will scan the surrounding area every 3s, revealing Enemy Heroes within 1000 units for 3s. 

Sonar Drone can detect Enemy Heroes through walls. 

Upon reaching Level 6, Sonar Drone also reveals invisible Units for the first 2 pulses.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 58 (+80%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description: Spirit: • Dash forward, Slowing all Enemies hit by {DashSlow}% for {DashDuration}s. • Deals {DashDamage}()Damage. Body: • Send out your staff Pushing everything away. • Slows by {Slow}% for {Duration}s. • Deals {PokeDamage}()Damage.
abilities.menu_description: Spirit: Wukong dashes forward dealing 60/95/130/165/200/235 (+110%) damage and Slowing everything hit by 40% for 1s. Body: Wukong enlarges his staff sending it forward dealing 60/90/120/150/180/210 (+100%) damage, Slowing for 30% for 0.75s and forcing away all enemies and Clones.

abilities.game_description:
<AbilityName>Spirit:</AbilityName>
• Walk upon the air for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>. 
• Leave behind a trail of <EffectText>Cloud</EffectText>.
• <EffectText>Cloud</EffectText> is walkable by allies.

<AbilityName>Body:</AbilityName>
• Leap in the current movement direction.
• Gain <EffectText>{AttackSpeed}% Attack Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{SpeedDuration}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Spirit:
Wukong gains 5/<wbr>6/<wbr>7/<wbr>8/<wbr>9/<wbr>10% movement speed and creates a trail of cloud, walkable by allies for 4s.

Body:
Wukong leaps in the current movement direction gaining 25/<wbr>30/<wbr>35/<wbr>40/<wbr>45/<wbr>50% Attack Speed for 4s.

abilities.game_description: Spirit: • Gain {DR}% Damage Reduction and Destroy Projectiles for 1s. • After, throw your staff and deal {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns for {Stun}s. Body: • Crash down to the ground dealing {FallDamage}()Damage. • Damage increased based on distance fallen up to 1500 units. • Minions receive {MinionDamage}% less damage.
abilities.menu_description: Spirit: Wukong spins his staff around himself Destroying Projectiles and gaining 25% Damage Reduction for the duration. Afterwards he throws the staff forward dealing 60/80/100/120/140/160 (+75%) damage and Stunning for 1s. Body: Wukong enlarges his staff and slams down to the ground dealing 60/95/130/165/200/235 (+135%) damage and slowing by 40% for 1. This damage is increased by drop distance up to 1500 units. Minions receive 30% less damage.

abilities.game_description:
Wukong switches between his Spirit and Body Stances.
Upon damaging Enemies:
• Gain a stack of Hair, up to 5. • At 5 stacks, remove them to spawn a Clone. • Leaving combat resets Hair stacks. • Clones have {Health}() Health and deal {Damage}()Damage per hit. • You may have up to {Amount} Clones at a time.
abilities.menu_description: Switch between Body and Spirit Stances Upon damaging Enemies 5 times, a hair leaps from Wukong and lands, spawning a Clone. Clones deal (+14%) physical damage per hit and have 18%() Health. Wukong may have up to 2/3/4/5 clones at one time. Leaving combat will reset the counter.

abilities.game_description: Jumping while mid-air will allow you to leap into the air.
abilities.menu_description: Double Jump to leap into the air.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack
: • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 57 (+85%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Crack your whip forming a sphere of pressure.
• Deals {Damage}()Physical Damage instantly. • Pushback Targets hit. • Reflects Enemy projectiles for the next {Duration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Yin cracks her whip, Pushing away nearby Enemies. Deals 90/130/170/210/250 (+100%) physical damage and creates a sphere of pressure around her for 0.8s. If Enemy projectiles hit the sphere, they are reflected toward the target location.

abilities.game_description:
Swing your whip and attach it to Target location.
• Upon hitting an Enemy or Terrain, Dash to the location. • Upon arrival, deal {Damage}()Physical Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Then Leap in current movement direction.

Passive: Every third successful consecutive Basic Attack deals {PercentDamage}%() Maximum Health Damage and restores {Healing}() Health.
Extend your whip.
• Increase Attack Range to 1100 units. • Gain 100% Cleave for {Duration}s.
abilities.menu_description:
Passive: Every third successful consecutive basic attack will deal 3/<wbr>3.75/<wbr>4.5/<wbr>5.25/<wbr>6% of the target’s maximum health as bonus physical damage and heals Yin for 10/<wbr>12.5/<wbr>15/<wbr>17.5/<wbr>20%.

Active: Yin extends her whip, increasing the range of her basic attack to 1100 units 
and gaining 100% cleave for 6s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Surround yourself in gale winds.</Header>
• Lasts <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• <CC_Text>Slows</CC_Text> Enemies within by <CC_Text>{SlowPercent}%</CC_Text>.
• Gain <EffectText>{MoveSpeed}% Movement Speed</EffectText> within.
• Enemy projectiles are <EffectText>Halted</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Yin surrounds herself in gale winds.

For 5s, the winds will apply a 20% Slow to Enemies within and grants Yin 10% movement speed. 
Enemy projectiles that travel through it are halted.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Basic Attacks against Heroes or Monsters grant Stacks:</Header>
• Stacks up to <EffectText>{MaxStacks}</EffectText> times and lasts <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• Each Stack grants <EffectText>{AttackSpeed}%</EffectText> Attack Speed. 
• Damaging Enemies with <AbilityName>Lash Kick</AbilityName> grants <EffectText>{Stacks}</EffectText> Stacks.
abilities.menu_description:
Yin’s basic attacks against Heroes or Monsters grant her a stack of Rising Storm per Target hit for 3s, stacking up to 8 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks. 

Each stack grants 3/4/5/6% attack speed, for a maximum of 24/32/40/48% attack speed.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 60 (+70%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Throw three exploding projectiles.
• Deal {Damage}()Damage • Apply Soul Rip to Heroes hit for {Duration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Launch three projectiles that explode, each dealing 30/42/54/66/78 (+40%) damage to targets hit and apply Soul Rip to them for 4s.

abilities.game_description:
Perform a Spinning Soul Kick.
• Deal {Damage}()Damage to nearby enemies. • Apply Soul Rip to Heroes hit for {Duration}s. • Restore {Healing}()Health. • Increased by up to {HealingMultiplier}% based on Missing Health. If cast in-air: • Leap upwards in current movement input direction.
abilities.menu_description: Perform a spinning kick that deals 80/105/130/155/180 (+90%) physical damage to nearby enemies and apply Soul Rip to them for 4s. If cast in-air, you will additionaly leap upwards in your current movement direction. Heal 25/35/45/55/65 (+70%) health, increased by 0-60% based on missing health if an Enemy Hero or Monster is hit.

abilities.game_description:
Launch Forwards.
• Deal {Damage}()Damage. • Slows Enemies by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Cooldown is reset upon consuming Soul Rip. Consumes Soul Rip to spawn a Soul for {Duration}s. • The Soul has {SoulHealth}% of their Maximum Health. • Shares Damage with the owner of the Soul.
abilities.menu_description: Rush forwards, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+110%) physical damage to targets hit. Colliding with a target affected by Soul Rip consumes it to reset the cooldown of Severance and tear their Soul from the target for 4s. Souls linger around their hosts with 9% of their maximum health and share any damage dealt to them with their host. Consuming Soul Rip with a Soul still active will refresh its health.

abilities.game_description:
Summon a Raging Maelstrom for {Duration}s.
• Deal {Damage}()Damage over the duration. • Slow enemies by {Slow}%. • Apply Soul Rip to Targets hit for {MarkDuration}s. After the Duration: • Deal {FinalDamage}()Damage and Pull enemies towards you. • Consume Soul Rip to spawn a Soul of each target.
abilities.menu_description: Channel for 1.5s, dealing 75/125/175 (+55%) physical damage to nearby enemies, applying Soul Rip and slowing them by 20% over the duration. At the end of the duration, pull all targets towards you, tear their spirits and strike downwards, dealing 130/215/300 (+100%) physical damage and reset the cooldown of Severence.

abilities.game_description:
Upon casting an Ability:
• Gain {AttackSpeed}% Attack Speed for {Duration}s. • The next two Basic Attacks become Ranged. • Deal {Damage}()Bonus Damage • Bounce twice, dealing {BounceMultiplier}% damage.
abilities.menu_description: Casting an ability grants you ranged (850u) basic attacks and 30/30/30/30/30/40/40/40/40/40/50/50/50/50/50/60/60/60% attack speed for the next two basic attacks. These attacks deal (+15%) bonus physical damage and bounce 2 times, dealing 15/15/15/15/15/20/20/20/20/20/25/25/25/25/25/30/30/30% damage to targets hit.

abilities.game_description:
Melee Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Melee basic attack dealing 61 (+75%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Hurl your spear forward.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Increased by {BonusDamage}% against Targets below 20% Health. • Deals {MinionDamage}% damage to Minions. • Releasing within 0.3s will Thrust the spear forward. • Thrusts refund 50% of the Cooldown.
abilities.menu_description: Channel to throw a spear, dealing 80/110/140/170/200 (+130%) physical damage to Enemies hit, increased by 100% against targets below 20% maximum health. Deals 75% damage to Minions. Releasing within 0.3s will thrust the spear forward, dealing the same damage and refunding half the cooldown.

abilities.game_description:
Unfold a shield for {Duration}s
. • Gain {DamageReduction}% forward facing Damage Reduction. • On recast or after the duration, swing the shield. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Increased up to {IncreasedDamage}()Damage based on duration. • Stuns for {Stun}s.
abilities.menu_description: Unfold a shield for 1.5s, reducing incoming damage by 75%. Upon recasting or after the duration, swing the shield dealing 55/70/85/100/115 (+80%) physical damage increased up to 121/154/187/220/253 (+176%) and stunning targets hit for 0.75s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Dash in your current movement direction.</Header>
• Gain <EffectText>{MovementSpeedMagnitude}% Movement Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{MovementSpeedDuration}s</EffectText>.
• Gain <EffectText>{AttackSpeed}% Attack Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{AttackSpeedDuration}s</EffectText>.
abilities.menu_description: Dash in your current movement direction, gaining 20% movement speed for 1s and 15/<wbr>20/<wbr>25/<wbr>30/<wbr>35% Attack Speed for 4s.

abilities.game_description:
Leap at a Hero creating a coliseum.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage to the Target Hero. • The Coliseum lasts for {Duration}s. • The bonus from Gladiator is doubled. • If the Target is killed, gain {OnKillPowerGain} Physical Power. • Recasting this ability will end it early.
abilities.menu_description: Leap at an Enemy Hero, dealing 200/300/400 (+75%) physical damage. A Coliseum is then summoned for 5.5s and the bonus from Gladiator is doubled. If the target is killed within the duration, you will permanently gain 5/8/11 Physical Power. You may recast this ability to end it early.

abilities.game_description:
On dealing damage to non-Minions:
• Gain a stack of Gladiator. • Stacks up to 8 times. • Each stack grants {PhysicalPower}()Physical Power. • Stacks will fall off after 5s without combat. • Restore {MaxHealthHealing}()Health per stack consumed.
abilities.menu_description:
Gain a stack of Gladiator when dealing damage with Basic Attacks or Abilities to non-minions, stacking up to 8 times. Each stack grants 1% increased Physical Power. 

After exiting combat, stacks will fall off once per second, restoring 0.4/<wbr>0.4/<wbr>0.4/<wbr>0.4/<wbr>0.4/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>0.8/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>1.6/<wbr>3.2/<wbr>3.2/<wbr>3.2% of his maximum health per stack consumed.

abilities.game_description:
Ranged Basic Attack.
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menu_description: Ranged basic attack dealing 50 (+60%) physical damage.

abilities.game_description:
Fire a healing bolt at an Ally:
• Restores {Healing}()Health. • Increases by up to {HealingBonus}% based on Missing Health. Passive: Basic Attacks deal {Damage}()Damage On-Hit over 3s.
abilities.menu_description: Fire a healing bolt at an Ally that restores 50/70/90/110/130 (+45%) health, increasing by up to 50% based on their missing health. Passive: Zinx's Basic Attacks become empowered, dealing 9/15/21/27/33 (+12%) magical damage on-hit over 3s.

abilities.game_description:
Launch an electromagnetic disk:
• Stops on the first Enemy hit. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns for {StunDuration}s. The disk ricochets {Ricochet} times, dealing the same effects: • Stun duration decreased by {AdditionalStunDuration}%. • Will not ricochet to previously hit Targets.
abilities.menu_description: Throw an electromagnetic disk dealing 75/105/135/165/195 (+40%) magical damage and Stunning for 1/1.05/1.1/1.15/1.2s. The disk can ricochet up to 5 times, dealing its damage again and Stunning each Target for 50% of the original duration. Will not ricochet to previously hit Targets.

abilities.game_description:
Discharge a pool of unstable radiation:
• Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {SlowPercent}% for {SlowDuration}s. After 0.75s, the pool erupts: • Deals {EruptDamage}()Damage. • Slows by {EruptSlow}% for {EruptSlowDuration}s.
abilities.menu_description: Shoot the ground to form a pool of radiation that deals 40/55/70/85/100 (+30%) magical damage and Slows by 30% for 0.75s. After 0.75s, the radiation erupts dealing 55/85/115/145/175 (+45%) magical damage and Slowing Enemies hit by 30% for 0.75s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Apply cellular restructuring to Yourself or an Ally:</Header> 
• Grants <EffectText>{DecayingMovementSpeed}%</EffectText> decaying <EffectText>Movement Speed</EffectText> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• Grants <EffectText>Revival</EffectText> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.

If the Target takes lethal damage within this time:
• After <EffectText>2.5s</EffectText>, they <EffectText>Resurrect</EffectText> with <EffectText>{HealthManaPercent}%</EffectText> <HealthText>Health</HealthText> and <ManaText>Mana</ManaText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Apply cellular restructuring to Yourself or an Ally Hero, granting 45% decaying movement speed and Revival for 4s.

If the Target takes lethal damage within this time, they Resurrect with 35/<wbr>45/<wbr>55% health and mana after 2.5s.

abilities.game_description:
<Header>Gain stacks upon damaging Enemy Heroes:</Header>
• Stacks last for <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>.
• <AbilityName>Triage Protocol</AbilityName> activates at <EffectText>5</EffectText> stacks.

Upon activation, become Empowered for the next <EffectText>{Duration}s</EffectText>:
• Gain <EffectText>{DecayingMovementSpeed}% Decaying Movement Speed</EffectText>.
• <AbilityName>Infuse</AbilityName> restores <HealthText>{Multiplier}%</HealthText> more <HealthText>Health</HealthText>.
abilities.menu_description:
Zinx gains a stack for 5s when damaging Enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks or Abilities, up to a maximum of 5.

At maximum stacks, Triage Protocol activates granting Zinx 15% decaying movement speed and  50% increased Infuse Healing for 5s. 

Stacks cannot be gained while Triage Protocol is on cooldown.
